section.title: Discussion>
section.description: The AlphaSportsWeb application displays the UNDERCONSTRUCT.A5W page when the user attempts to display an unfinished page. UNDERCONSTRUCT.A5W contains the NAV_MAIN navigation component.

section.title: Links
section.description: The Page Examples > Under Construction Internal entry of the NAV_INT navigation component calls the UNDERCONSTRUCT.A5W page.

section.title: Page Source
section.description: The location = "" statement removes the highlight from all menu entries.
section.example: with tmpl_NAV_MAIN location = "" componentName = "NAV_MAIN" end with
